definitions.definition: Any of various small marsupials of Australia and New Guinea , some with distinctive long snouts , of the family Peramelidae .
A bandicoot rat ; any of the genera Bandicota and Nesokia of rat -like rodents of southeast Asia .

main_definition: Any of various small marsupials of Australia and New Guinea , some with distinctive long snouts , of the family Peramelidae .
secondary_definitions: A bandicoot rat ; any of the genera Bandicota and Nesokia of rat -like rodents of southeast Asia .
